alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:54AM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THURSDAY TO NOON MST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Fergus County below 4500ft and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 AM Thursday to Noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap
